metadata.Title: soil temperature model
metadata.Extended description: Single-component soil temperature model computing a daily temperature profile at 1 cm resolution and mean temperature per user-defined layers. It derives the canopy temperature amplitude from daily min/max canopy temperatures, then updates each depth using an exponentially damped signal (based on fixed thermal diffusivity and diurnal frequency), a relaxation toward canopy temperature, and the effect of minimum air temperature; it also computes canopy mean temperature and updates previous state variables. Initialization sets the soil profile and canopy temperature to the first-day air temperature.
metadata.Short description: Calculates soil temperature profile and layer-mean temperatures and updates previous states.
